mapper.select: SELECT patient_id AS userId, email AS userEmail, password AS userPwd, name AS userName, phone AS userPhone, dob AS userDob, gender AS userGender, address AS userAddr, medical_history AS userMedicalHistory, lifestyle_habits AS userLifestyleHabits, account_status AS userAccountStatus, language_preference AS languagePreference, provider, provider_id AS providerId, user_role AS userRole, created_at AS userRegdate, updated_at AS userUpdate FROM patient WHERE email = #{email}

SELECT patient_id AS userId, email AS userEmail, password AS userPwd, name AS userName, phone AS userPhone, dob AS userDob, gender AS userGender, address AS userAddr, medical_history AS userMedicalHistory, lifestyle_habits AS userLifestyleHabits, account_status AS userAccountStatus, language_preference AS languagePreference, provider, provider_id AS providerId, user_role AS userRole, created_at AS userRegdate, updated_at AS userUpdate FROM patient WHERE patient_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO patient ( email, password, name, phone, dob, gender, address, medical_history, lifestyle_habits, account_status, language_preference, provider, provider_id, user_role, created_at ) VALUES ( #{userEmail}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userDob}, #{userGender}, #{userAddr}, #{userMedicalHistory}, #{userLifestyleHabits}, COALESCE(#{userAccountStatus}, 'active'), COALESCE(#{languagePreference}, 'ko'), #{provider}, #{providerId}, COALESCE(#{userRole}, 'ROLE_USER'), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE patient SET password = #{userPwd}, name = #{userName}, address = #{userAddr}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE patient_id = #{userId}
